messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] half-cocked
messages.msgSnippet: ... == Well, I was more or less talking about people flaming others with differing opinions, not people who just disagreed or dissected ideas. That s all :-)
messages.messageBody:
starsuncloud@... (Ren) wrote:

>I suppose I get a bit touchy when people say stuff like that...because
>then if you offer advice or opinions that are totally against what someone
>has already said, people scream "put down"!
==
Well, I was more or less talking about people flaming others with differing
opinions, not people who just disagreed or dissected ideas. That's all :-)

Todd
-------------------------------------

it's still extremely popular!"

messages.subject: half-cocked
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/5/02 7:42:35 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/5/02 7:42:35 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Todd, who *certainly* didn't mean to offend anybody :-((( >>

YOU didn't offend me Todd, the notion that people who disagree may be
half-cocked did. :) grins.
It's quite alright. I suppose I get a bit touchy when people say stuff like
that...because then if you offer advice or opinions that are totally against
what someone has already said, people scream "put down"! I don't think it's
a put down to dissect an idea, but then, some would disagree with me..

Cheers,
Ren
